page.title: 17Transport in PAUNTLEY
page.content:
The only form of local public transport is the voluntary community "Dial-a-Ride" minibus. This has been used by{17}households.
Car ownership is a necessity.{35 families own{1}car,{34}own{2}cars,{16 own{3}cars, and{2}families own{4}cars.
Land/Rangerovers are often used as cars in addition to being farm vehicles.{18}households have{1}Land/ Rangerover,{3}households have{2.
{132}cars are driven less than{50}miles per week.{18}cars are driven{51-100 miles per week,{4}cars are driven over {300}miles per week. The remainder of the cars range between{100}and{250 miles per week.
